00088                 #ifdef COMPILE_ix86_ASM
00089 
00090                         // WE WANT repnz; movsq\n"!!!
00091 
00092                         inline void kvi_fastmove(void * dst_ptr,const void *src_ptr,int len)
00093                         {
00094                                 __asm__ __volatile__(
00095                                         "       cld\n"
00096                                         "       shr $1,%0\n"
00097                                         "       jnc 1f\n"
00098                                         "       movsb\n"
00099                                         "1:\n"
00100                                         "       shr $1,%0\n"
00101                                         "       jnc 2f\n"
00102                                         "       movsw\n"
00103                                         "2:\n"
00104                                         "       repnz; movsl\n"
00105                                         : "=c" (len), "=&S" (src_ptr), "=&D" (dst_ptr)
00106                                         : "0"  (len), "1"   (src_ptr), "2"   (dst_ptr)
00107                                 );
00108                         }
00109 
00110                         inline void kvi_fastmoveodd(void * dst_ptr,const void *src_ptr,int len)
00111                         {
00112                                 __asm__ __volatile__(
00113                                         "       cld\n"
00114                                         "       shr $2,%0\n"
00115                                         "       jnc 1f\n"
00116                                         "       movsw\n"
00117                                         "1:\n"
00118                                         "       repnz; movsl\n"
00119                                         : "=c" (len), "=&S" (src_ptr), "=&D" (dst_ptr)
00120                                         : "0"  (len), "1"   (src_ptr), "2"   (dst_ptr)
00121                                 );
00122                         }
00123 
00124                 #else // ! COMPILE_ix86_ASM
00125 
00135                         extern void kvi_fastmove(void *dst_ptr,const void *src_ptr,int len);
00136 
00146                         extern void kvi_fastmoveodd(void *dst_ptr,const void *src_ptr,int len);
00147 
00148                 #endif // !COMPILE_ix86_ASM
00149 
00150         #endif // COMPILE_WITH_SYSTEM_MEMMOVE
